data.title: Meet the stars of 'Camp Rock 2' tomorrow at the Verizon Store
data.meta_description:
They will be at the Forest Avenue location from noon to 2 p.m.  

STATEN ISLAND, N.Y. - Verizon FiOS tomorrow to celebrate the upcoming release of Disney Channel's "Camp Rock 2: The Final Jam."

All are invited to come to a day of fun, meet several stars of the film, and enter to win passes to the Aug. 18 red-carpet film premiere in Manhattan.
data.text:
By CHRISTINA ANGELI

STATEN ISLAND, N.Y. - Verizon FiOS tomorrow to celebrate the upcoming release of Disney Channel's "Camp Rock 2: The Final Jam."

All are invited to come to a day of fun, meet several stars of the film, and enter to win passes to the Aug. 18 red-carpet film premiere in Manhattan.

FiOS subscribers will be the first to see "Camp Rock 2: The Final Jam" via Video On Demand on Sept. 1, two days prior to the official launch on the Disney channel, Sept. 3 at 8 p.m. EDT.

In addition, consumers who become a fan of FiOs on Facebook by August 31 can register to win a Walt Disney World Resort vacation for four, including a VIP breakfast with select stars from the cast.

"Camp Rock 2: The Final Jam," stars Demi Lovato, Kevin, Joe and Nick Jonas, all reprising their starring roles from the original "Camp Rock."

Other returning cast members include: Alyson Stoner, Meaghan Martin, Anna Maria Perez de Tagle, Roshon Fegan, Daniel Fathers and Maria Canals-Barrera. New cast members joining the crew are Matthew "Mdot" Finely and Chloe Bridges, who will be present at the event.

The event will take place tomorrow at the Verizon Store located at 1625 Forest Ave. in Port Richmond Center, from 12 p.m. to 2 p.m.
